LanguageData.AF_Leggings_SG.label: Gylanly Furry-leg Warmers
LanguageData.AF_Leggings_SG.description: Woven from Gylanly fibres, this incredible material was not surpassed by synthetic materials until Ferian broke through the light barrier. \n\nA perfect pair of leg warmers for reliability and comfort! It's a perfect fit with a furry body!
